overview: Kana, a middle-aged woman who works for a company. One day, she asks the manager of the company she is having an affair with to get her friend's son Kazuki a job. After some time, her friend and her son drink her liquor with her maid Megumi, and take her drunk to her hotel, where she is concerned, but falls for her enticing her. Meanwhile, the company manager, increasingly tired of Kana, wants to satisfy her desires, and seduces her maid Megumi with her money to become her new sex partner. The abandoned Kana and Kazuki. The two plan to avenge the atrocities of the manager...
title: Mom's Friend's Sex
